name: Draugen Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The original soundtrack to Draugen contains 25 tracks and over one hour of music composed by Simon Poole, the award-winning audio director and composer behind Dreamfall and Dreamfall Chapters, The Secret World, The Park, and My Child Lebensborn. The soundtrack contains both MP3 and FLAC files.

Credits


Madeleine Ossum - Violin
Emilie Heldal Lidsheim - Viola
Ingvild Nesdal Sandnes - Cello
Ingvild Hasund - Vocals
Jorunn Torsheim - Vocals
Torunn Østrem Ossum - Vocals
Julie Ofelia Østrem Ossum - Vocals
Simon Poole - Piano and additional instruments

"Den dag kjem aldri" is a traditional folk song with lyrics by Aasmund Olavsson Vinje. Performed by Ingvild Hasund.

Music recorded at Propeller Music Division, Oslo
Mixed by Rich Aitken at Nimrod Sound
Mastered by Chris Sansom at Propeller Mastering

To access this content, right click Draugen in your Steam library -> View Downloadable Content -> Select the LOCAL FILES tab -> BROWSE LOCAL FILES. You will find FLAC, MP3 and WAV files inside the 'Original soundtrack' directory.

reviews:

90% – Dark Station

“beautiful visuals and a soundtrack that brings the atmosphere to another level”
80% – Geeksandcom

95% – Well Played
